description: Manchester City podcast: Nedum Onuoha discusses pre-season
title: Manchester City podcast: Nedum Onuoha discusses pre-season
title_page: Manchester City podcast: Nedum Onuoha discusses pre-season - BBC Sport
maintext:
With the new campaign less than two weeks away, BBC Radio Manchester's We're Not Really Here podcast have been looking at Manchester City's preparations for the new campaign.
Former City defender Nedum Onuoha also gave his insight into what it's like for a player in pre-season.
